snippet: As they have since the start of the revolution last year, Egyptian bloggers and journalists reported Tuesday's protest online as it unfolded, transmitting images, video and text accounts from their phones to social networks.
abstract: As they have since the start of the revolution last year, Egyptian bloggers and journalists reported Tuesday's protest online as it unfolded, transmitting images, video and text accounts from their phones to social networks.

headline.main: Egyptians at the Palace Gates, Phones in Hand

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
